synopsis.text: Japanese rock band BAKUFU-SLUMP's captivating music video for their song "Higashi no Shima ni Kobuta ga Ita" graced the screens of NHK's popular Minna no Uta program. This enthralling visual spectacle perfectly complements the song's infectious melody, offering viewers an unforgettable audiovisual experience. Don't miss out on this musical journey brought to you by BAKUFU-SLUMP and NHK's Minna no Uta.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
